author: cordellsy
content:
Hey, we soft-launched some eth2 content on ethereum.org. There's a few style bugs here and there we're still ironing out but thought it'd be good to show you folks so you can provide any feedback or ideas you might have: https://ethereum.org/en/eth2/

Feel free to reach out with ideas/feedback or create github issues directly. Happy weekend y'all!

author: sma4321
content: looks good, but something that's argued to be the same thing we know and love isn't really "radical"; that disjoint jars a bit...

author: schone_wizard
content: is there a reason sometimes when uplaoding the same deposit data file to launchpad, and wanting to continue going one by one, old validators which have already been deposited and show correctly on beaconcha.in show as "ready" on launchpad and let you start again ?

author: schone_wizard
content: even tho the deposits have already been made

author: schone_wizard
content: it appears that beaconcha.in gives back 429, too many requests at times.  perhaps if there was a way to batch requests launchpad wouldn't have this bug?
